summary: ABOUT TRUMPEPE - On October 13th, 2015, Donald Trump tweeted an illustration of Pepe as himself standing at a podium with the President of the United States Seal. Introducing the Trumpepe! Ever wondered what would happen if you combined the wit of Trump with the absurdity of Pepe the Frog? This project promises to be more chaotic than a press conference and more unpredictable than a late-night Twitter rant. Bringing laughter and satire to the political scene, one meme at a time!
